Reviews.Title: samsung windows mobile
Reviews.Author: jacqueline knight
Reviews.Content: Owned this phone till after a year I dropped it and the inside screen broke. It is really heavy compared to newer phone but I loved it and would be willing to buy another if they were cheaper considering their so out dated. The phone held up GREAT though. It was dropped a million and one times, had a one year old slobber on it, drag it across cement, throw it, ect. and it still worked awesome for a long long time.
